name: Affirmation Fish: Anxiety Fishues
description:
"Affirmation Fish" is a 2D pixel game about facing inner doubts and anxieties, and using healthy coping strategies like affirmations and visualizations.

You are having a bad mental health day. The anxieties are building up, manifesting as fish in your apartment. You have an affirmation fish, however, a bigger butterfly fish that goes around and eats the worries. Clear the levels, and make your bad mental health day a little better.

Controls:

WASD to move
